thread.title_full: The Charming Relais Christine - Review of Relais Christine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: travelnotebook
title: The Charming Relais Christine
text: The location of the Relais Christine is an ideal base for Paris museums. restaurants, and shopping attractions. This charming hotel is off the beaten track and offers serene, quiet accommodations with an excellent breakfast. Rooms are typically small, Parisian style.
